title: "VW-Owned Navistar Starts Self-Driving Trucking Tests In Texas"
excerpt: "Trucks from the division of the Volkswagen Group’s Traton truck manufacturing subsidiary have already been equipped with the ‘SuperDrive by Plus’ system and are being validated with a safety driver on routes in Texas. The two firms will work together to create hub-to-hub autonomous trucking routes."
